### Genetic Architecture of Adaptation

* Uses existing GWAS and demographic model.
* Build CNN to predict parameters of an optimum shift model [Stetter 2018](https://journals.plos.org/plosgenetics/article/comments?id=10.1371/journal.pgen.1007794)

### Estimate migratino surface maize Mexico

* Uses SEEDs data of ~2500 landraces in Mexico
* Run [Petkova 2016](https://www.nature.com/articles/ng.3464) or similar methods

### Recent bottlenecks due to European contact

* Uses landrace data from C2 (unpublished) or other samples
* [IBD](https://journals.plos.org/plosgenetics/article?id=10.1371/journal.pgen.1007385) or other approaches to identify recent bottleneck
